attributes.action: Tackle car congestion by allowing full car licence holders to ride 125cc Motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In some european countries like France, car driving licence holders are allowed to ride up to a 125cc motorcycle without an L plate, and carry passengers. An MOT certificate is not required. This would promote smaller vehicles on small journys & reduce congestion for no extra cost to government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
